name: Fried Egg & Sausage
description: A fried egg is a cooked dish made from one or more eggs which are removed from their shells and placed into a frying pan and fried with minimal accompaniment.

name: Creamed Chipped Beef
description: Creamed Chipped Beef is a dish comprised of chopped dried beef in a creamy luscious lightly seasoned white sauce. The cream sauce is usually a béchamel.

name: Crispy Chicken Wings
description: Place the wings on a cooking rack in a sheet pan. This lets air circulate all around the chicken pieces so that they get evenly crisp. It also lets the fat drip away from the chicken.

name: Fish With Chips
description: Haddock is the fish that most chefs prefer for fish and chips. The texture isn't as flaky or tender as cod but the meat has more flavor. Haddock has a slight sweetness .

name: Chicken Popcorn
description: Popcorn chicken is an American dish consisting of tiny, bite-sized pieces of chicken that have been breaded or battered and deep-fried.

name: Risotto
description: A classic risotto is a rich, creamy dish with nearly a porridge-like consistency, yet each grain of rice retains a distinct bite. In Italian risotto, the rice is parched .

name: Penne Alla Vodka
description: Penne alla vodka is a pasta dish made with vodka and penne pasta, usually made with heavy cream, crushed tomatoes, onions, and sometimes sausage, pancetta.

name: Carbonara
description: Carbonara (Italian: [karboˈnaːra]) is an Italian pasta dish from Rome made with eggs, hard cheese, cured pork, and black pepper. The cheese is usually Pecoriid Romaid.

name: Spaghetti Aglio
description: Aglio e Olio literally means olive oil and garlic in Italian. It is a traditional pasta recipe from Naples.This dish is made by sautéing sliced garlic in olive oil.

name: Garlic Prime Rib
description: That's the name you'll see at the butcher counter. The standing rib roast unsurprisingly comes from the rib section of the cow.

name: Creamy Salad
description: The key to keeping creamy salad from drying out is the pasta. If you don't cook it eidugh, the pasta won't grab on to the dressing .

name: Thai Yum Soup
description: Tom Yum Soup is the most popular soup in Thailand – for a reason. It's bold yet light, tart, salty and citrusy, bursting with layer.
